desc.zh-Hans: 龙村地铁是在网页游戏Bloxd伟大服龙村地区运营的铁路系统，由建筑师ShaXingAn与SinisterBlade于2024年7月起施工。其修建的主要目的是方便龙村地区居民出行和游客参观，时至今日，龙村地铁依旧承担着连接龙村四区交通的重要任务。
desc.zh-Hant: 龍村捷運是在網頁遊戲Bloxd偉大服龍村地區運營的鐵路系統，由建築師ShaXingAn與SinisterBlade於2024年7月起施工。 其修建的主要目的是方便龍村地區居民出行和遊客參觀，時至今日，龍村捷運依舊承擔著連接龍村四區交通的重要任務。
desc.en: Longcun Subway is a railway system operated in the Longcun Village area of the web game Bloxd. It was constructed by architects ShaXingAn and SinisterBlade starting in July 2024. The main purpose of its construction is to facilitate the travel of residents and tourists in the Longcun Village area. To this day, the Longcun Subway still plays an important role in connecting the transportation of the four districts of Longcun Village.

reference: 爱发电,Sun Nov 10 2024 16:41:06 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)

updateHistory.reason: 龙村地铁近期线路调整
